name: Kaiju Apocalypse
description:
This game was made for Kaiju-Jam 2, only the first mission is finished at the moment. 

Giant Crabs have invaded Japan, rain down orbital and conventional weaponry to obliterate all enemies!

Optional themes: *Crustacean:  Giant Crabs... *Obsolete: The game was made to look like it's run on an Amber CRT monitor which is pretty obsolete irl.

Credits:

Music created for this Jam by: Alex Weise, https://on.soundcloud.com/RdRj2

Sound effects from:  Groovy's Retro Sound Effects

Crab art was taken from: Elthen's Pixel Art Shop
